name: Epicwhale
overview:
Epicwhale is a team with ideas that are simple and clear. Ideas that can be transformed into web-based apps.

Their focus is on solving problems that they believe are their own too. Epicwhale does this using simple and manageable web-based apps. There’s a whole bunch of new things they are learning and discovering on the job which they like to share with the world around them. They believe there is a lot that can be done to make the Indian-web space a better one and they’re hoping to contribute towards it in everything they do.

Their first product is a free sms widget - textmewidget.com
